import NoResultCells from './NoResultCells?dev-site-example';

# No Result Cells

### Description

If the [content property](/components/cerner-terra-framework-docs/data-grid/flowsheet-data-grid/about#cells) of a cell is an empty string, "--", or null, it is represented by two dashes and announced by assistive technologies as *No result*.

<NoResultCells title= 'Flowsheet Data Grid with "No Result" Cells' />
